name: Zombie chaos (OREN2B3K)
description:
The game is a survival game where you have to kill as many zombies as possible before you die. The game is suitable for those who love horror games and FPS.A little about me Hi I am Oren I have been developing games for about 9 months. The zombies will come to you and they not going to stop. Be patient
